name: Il Rugginoso
body:
### About me
My name is Lorenzo Masini, 26 yo, living in Florence and working as software developer at [Develer srl](http://www.develer.com/).
My favourite programming languages are C, C++, Objective-C and Python.
I like folk metal music and beer.

### Projects
* [Pyjacker](http://github.com/rugginoso/Pyjacker) - Library Hijacking hooks in Python
* [GCDNetworking](http://github.com/rugginoso/GCDNetworking) - Asynchronous network sockets using Grand Central Dispatch
* [Moodeque](https://github.com/organizations/moodeque) - Application which automatically select the music in a venue using [StereoMood](http://www.stereomood.com/) apis for the [Hack Italy](http://hackitaly.pbworks.com/) event. Developed in team with @gbagnoli, @fedepaol, @stefanofontanelli and @mojaves.

### Contacts
* [Twitter](http://www.twitter.com/rugginoso)
* [Facebook](http://www.facebook.com/rugginoso)
